entry.name: transfer
entry.title: .transfer()
entry.desc: Transfers the outline of an element to another element

longdesc.p: Very useful when trying to visualize interaction between two elements.
The transfer element itself has the class ui-effects-transfer, and needs to be styled by you, for example by adding a background or border.

property.name: to
property.desc: The target of the transfer effect.

property.name: className
property.desc: A class to add to the transfer element, in addition to ui-effects-transfer.

property.name: easing
property.desc: The easing to use for the animation.

argument.name: done
argument.desc: A function to invoke once the animation completes.

example.desc: Clicking on the green element transfers to the other.
